name: The Girl in my Dreams
description:
The Girl in my Dreams is a short visual novel where you play as someone named Chihiro, a person who lives a fairly average life apart from one thing--their dreams. Every single night, they have these vivid dreams of this beautiful, fanciful world, a world that's nearly perfect in every way! Well, apart from one thing--at the end of each of their dreams, they see this--girl. And it's your job as the player to find out what you can about the girl!

The game has three endings, so do your best to get them all!

This is my first game, and I worked really hard on it--considering I did nearly all of it myself! So I really, really hope you'll enjoy it! You don't have to pay anything for it, but I'd really appreciate if you did, so please consider it!  (´｡･v･｡｀)
